About me

I'm Dimeji and I'm a Full Stack Developer

Diligent software engineer with 1+ years experience in commercial application development. Eager to join Cyclone Inc. to build innovative and cutting edge business solutions for the impressive suite of clients within its global reach. In previous roles, slashed downtime by 25% and ensured 98% on-time project completion. Also identified and dealt with a significant process bottleneck that boosted coding efficiency by 35% when resolved.
